subject: Order number ssn3918
description_text:
Order pedals and haptics. Pedals come in. Haptics did not. Its been weeks.   I keep getting sent a link to a portal that opens a fucking forum. Thats empty.   Literally no support ticket. Its bullshit.  Email me back.  And tell me when i can get my money or my product. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt LeBlanc,      Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9261290378009807352546
